headline.main: UFC Says Ex-Champ Anderson Silva Tests Positive for Steroids
headline.print_headline: UFC Says Ex-Champ Anderson Silva Tests Positive for Steroids

docs.snippet: Former UFC middleweight champion Anderson Silva has tested positive for steroid use....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former UFC middleweight champion Anderson Silva has tested positive for steroid use.

docs.snippet: Roger Hanson calls himself the iceman. The 66 foot-high ice sculpture he’s been working on in Superior, Wis., since November came tumbling down Tuesday morning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roger Hanson calls himself the iceman. The 66 foot-high ice sculpture he’s been working on in Superior, Wis., since November came tumbling down Tuesday morning.

headline.main: Lineup Change Helps Celtics Beat Knicks, Snap 3-Game Skid
headline.print_headline: Lineup Change Helps Celtics Beat Knicks, Snap 3-Game Skid

docs.snippet: Avery Bradley scored 26 points, Jared Sullinger added 22 and the Boston Celtics snapped a three-game losing streak with a 108-97 victory over the New York Knicks on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Avery Bradley scored 26 points, Jared Sullinger added 22 and the Boston Celtics snapped a three-game losing streak with a 108-97 victory over the New York Knicks on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Video captures fiery aftermath of fatal NY commuter train collision
headline.sub: Video captures fiery aftermath of fatal NY commuter train collision

docs.snippet: A short amateur video captures the fiery aftermath of a fatal New York commuter train collision that reportedly left at least six people dead. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: A short amateur video captures the fiery aftermath of a fatal New York commuter train collision that reportedly left at least six people dead. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: With One's Head in the Clouds
Hayes Has 2 Goals, Lifts Panthers to 4-2 Win Over Islanders
headline.print_headline: Hayes Has 2 Goals, Lifts Panthers to 4-2 Win Over Islanders

docs.snippet: Jimmy Hayes' second goal of the game 2:10 into the third period lifted the slumping Florida Panthers to a 4-2 victory over the New York Islanders on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jimmy Hayes' second goal of the game 2:10 into the third period lifted the slumping Florida Panthers to a 4-2 victory over the New York Islanders on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Pistons Dominate 1st, Beat Heat 108-91 Despite 34 From Bosh
headline.print_headline: Pistons Dominate 1st, Beat Heat 108-91 Despite 34 From Bosh

docs.snippet: D.J. Augustin had 25 points and 13 assists and the Detroit Pistons closed the first quarter on a 25-1 run, going on to beat the Miami Heat 108-91 on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: D.J. Augustin had 25 points and 13 assists and the Detroit Pistons closed the first quarter on a 25-1 run, going on to beat the Miami Heat 108-91 on Tuesday night.

headline.main: South Korean Yang Gunning for the Big Time
headline.print_headline: South Korean Yang Gunning for the Big Time

docs.snippet: U.S. Amateur champion Gunn Yang will use the Farmers Insurance Open to acclimatise to golf at the highest level as part of his preparations for the Masters and U.S. and British Opens....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Amateur champion Gunn Yang will use the Farmers Insurance Open to acclimatise to golf at the highest level as part of his preparations for the Masters and U.S. and British Opens.

headline.main: McDonald's Mexico Apologizes for Comment on Tamales
headline.print_headline: McDonald's Mexico Apologizes for Comment on Tamales

docs.snippet: McDonald's subsidiary in Mexico is apologizing for a Facebook post that was seen as trashing tamales, Mexico's corn-dough treat....
docs.lead_paragraph: McDonald's subsidiary in Mexico is apologizing for a Facebook post that was seen as trashing tamales, Mexico's corn-dough treat.

headline.main: Dunham Scores 21 to Lead No. 22 Butler Past St. John's 85-62
headline.print_headline: Dunham Scores 21 to Lead No. 22 Butler Past St. John's 85-62

docs.snippet: Kellen Dunham had 21 points and seven rebounds to lead No. 22 Butler to an 85-62 victory over St. John's on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kellen Dunham had 21 points and seven rebounds to lead No. 22 Butler to an 85-62 victory over St. John's on Tuesday night.
